column4: can someone plz help me..after update new driver for gforce 8400gs, i reboot and stuck at initramfs screen, how i fix this?
press shift during boot to get the grub menu.  Can you boot into recovery mode?
Can you boot recovery mode?
let me put back livecd
no no.  Can you boot recovery mode without a live Cd.  Press shift during normal boot (before Ubuntu begin) and use the grub menu
yea i can boot to cmd line,,, but what do i do there?
What is the name of the driver you installed?
... what?
Hang on.  I have to find the actual package name.
thanks
try this: sudo apt-get purge nvidia-glx     then press tab twice (or three times) real fast
ok let me try
this is 10.10  maverick ?
Do you have a geforce 8400gs   ?
hello?
I have to go.  Try to figure out which of these packages you installed so you can remove it.  http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=nvidia&searchon=names&suite=maverick&section=all
thanks
System -> Admin -> Software sources  change the dropdown from 'LTS only' to normal releases.  Then start the update manager.
thanks
Did you get your nvidia issue fixeD?
oh :( we could have fixed it!!!
oh well.  working again now right?
You should have just installed 10.10 right away since you clean installed anyway
